Articles.Content:
I need some help, the cleverbobcat.dll is broken for the DEMV rovers again I managed to contact cleverwalrus to update them when 0.23 came out however after several attempts to contact her it appears she has dropped off the grid.

I need some help or somebody to teach me to compile the cleverbobcat DLL which is available here http://cleverbobcat.codeplex.com/Sou...everBobCat.sln

my problem is I have never done it before I am just a windows admin in RL not a programmer or developer, I have VS2012 installed and can open the solution but have no idea on what to do next if someone could help me out it would be greatly appreciated, if not perhaps you may be able to steer me towards a tutorial on what to do.

In no way is this an official patch or representing Bobcat in any way. This is simply a recompile of his source - it is unmodified and may be unstable. I have compiled it against 64bit and 32bit KSP.

Edited July 29, 2014 by JeffersonFlight
Thanks for doing that, they now work again I would like to learn how to recompile the DLL so i can keep it up to date
I'm glad to hear that did the trick. I have sent you a PM with some useful information on setting up a compiler and getting started.
